summary.span: 实现按钮控件共同的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality common to button controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不会从继承 。You do not typically inherit from . 若要创建自己的按钮类，请从 、 或 类继承。To create your own button class, inherit from the , , or class. 若要让派生按钮控件显示图像，请设置 属性或 和 属性。To have the derived button control display an image, set the property or the and properties. 通过设置属性，可以在按钮控件上对齐图像 。The image can be aligned on the button control by setting the property. 同样，若要对齐 按钮控件上显示的，请设置 属性。Likewise, to align the displayed on the button control, set the property. 属性确定控件的样式和外观。The property determines the style and appearance of the control. 如果将 属性设置为 ，则用户的操作系统将确定控件的外观。If the property is set to , the user's operating system determines the appearance of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否要在控件的右边缘显示省略号 (...) 以表示控件文本超出指定的控件长度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ellipsis character (...) appears at the right edge of the control, denoting that the control text extends beyond the specified length of the control.

value.span: 如果要通过省略号指示附加标签文本，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the additional label text is to be indicated by an ellipsis; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为， `true` 则当用户通过鼠标越过控件时，将显示超出控件宽度的文本。Set to `true` to display text that extends beyond the width of the control when the user passes over the control with the mouse. 如果需要，必须将控件的 `AutoSize` 属性设置为 `false` `true` 。You must set the control's `AutoSize` property to `false` if you want to be `true`. 如果 `AutoSize` 为 `true` ，则控件将增长以适应文本，并且不会显示省略号。If `AutoSize` is `true`, the control will grow to fit the text and an ellipsis will not appear.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含从继承的类型的实例 ，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后命名该实例 `ButtonBase1` ，并确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then name the instance `ButtonBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 true 时，此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源 。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时， 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置按钮控件的平面样式外观。

span.span: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the button control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 和类的属性 设置为时 `System` ，控件由用户的操作系统绘制，并且检查对齐方式取决于 `CheckAlign` 和 属性值。When the property of the and classes is set to `System`, the control is drawn by the user's operating system and the check alignment is based upon the `CheckAlign` and property values. `CheckAlign`属性值不会更改，但控件的外观可能会受到影响。The `CheckAlign` property value is not changed, but the appearance of the control can be affected. 复选框与控件的左边缘或右边缘水平对齐 (左对齐或居中对齐显示左对齐，右对齐保持不变) ，并与说明性文本垂直对齐。The check box is horizontally aligned with either the left or right edge of the control (a left or center alignment appears left aligned, right remains unchanged), and vertically aligned the same as the descriptive text. 例如，如果有一个 控件，其 `CheckAlign` 属性值为 `ContentAlignment` 。For example, if you have a control with a `CheckAlign` property value of `ContentAlignment`. `MiddleCenter`， 属性值为 `ContentAlignment.TopRight` ， 属性值设置为 `System` ，则复选框对齐方式将显示为， `ContentAlignment.TopLeft` 而文本对齐方式保持不变。`MiddleCenter`, a property value of `ContentAlignment.TopRight`, and the property value is set to `System`, the check box alignment will appear to be `ContentAlignment.TopLeft` while the text alignment remains unchanged. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 属性设置为 `FlatStyle.System` ，则 不会显示分配给该属性的任何图像。If the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the property are not displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类， 并设置其一些公共属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 结果将是一个平面按钮，其左侧有文本，右侧有一个图像。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 此代码要求在目录中有一个名为的位图映像 `MyBitMap.bmp` `C:\Graphics` ，并且包含对该 命名空间的引用。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The value assigned is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Size GetPreferredSize(valuetype System.Drawing.Size proposedSize) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetPreferredSize (proposedSize As Size) As Size

param.name: proposedSize
param.span: 控件的自定义大小的区域。

span.span: The custom-sized area for a control.

summary.span: 检索适合控件的矩形区域的大小。

span.span: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.

returns.span: 类型为 的有序对，表示矩形的宽度和高度。

span.span: An ordered pair of type representing the width and height of a rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的行为因 控件而异。The behavior of differs by control. 可能无法将返回的大小分配给控件。The might be unable to assign the returned size to the control. 你可以返回比参数中指示的约束大的大小 `proposedSize` ，但 `proposedSize` 应在约束减少时减小。You can return a size larger than the constraints indicated in the `proposedSize` parameter, but `proposedSize` should decrease as the constraint decreases. 例如， `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` 不应大于 `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))` 。For example, `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` should not be wider than `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`. 异常是 `proposedSize` 0 或的 `Size.Empty` ，定义为不约束。The exception is a `proposedSize` of 0 or `Size.Empty`, which are defined as unconstrained.

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on a button control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性时， 属性将设置为 `null` ， 属性将设置为默认值-1。When the property is set, the property will be set to `null`, and the property will be set to its default, -1. > [!NOTE] > 如果将 属性设置为 `FlatStyle.System` ，则 不会显示分配给该属性的任何图像。If the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the property are not displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类， 并设置其一些公共属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 结果将是一个平面按钮，其左侧有文本，右侧有一个图像。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 此代码要求在目录中有一个名为的位图映像 `MyBitMap.bmp` `C:\Graphics` ，并且包含对该 命名空间的引用。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. summary.span: 获取或设置按钮控件上显示的图像的图像列表索引值。

span.span: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image displayed on the button control.

value.span: 从零开始的索引，表示 中的图像位置。

span.span: A zero-based index, which represents the image position in an .
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置或属性时，属性将 设置为其默认值 `null` 。When the or properties are set, the property is set to its default value, `null`. 和 是互斥的，也就是说，如果设置了一个，则将另一个设置为无效值并将其忽略。 and are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is set to an invalid value and ignored. 如果设置了 属性，则 属性会自动设置为-1。If you set the property, the property is automatically set to -1. 或者，如果设置了 属性，则会 自动将设置为空字符串 ( "" ) 。Alternatively, if you set the property, the is automatically set to an empty string (""). 如果 属性值更改为 `null` ，则 属性返回其默认值-1。If the property value is changed to `null`, the property returns its default value, -1. 但是，分配的 值在内部保留，并在另一个 对象分配给属性时使用 。However, the assigned value is retained internally and used when another object is assigned to the property. 如果分配给 该属性的新的 属性值小于或等于赋给属性的值 减一 (以将集合作为从零开始的索引) ，则该 属性值将调整为小于 属性值的值。If the new assigned to the property has an property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the property minus one (to account for the collection being a zero-based index), the property value is adjusted to one less than the property value. 例如，请考虑一个按钮控件，其 包含三个图像，其 属性设置为2。For example, consider a button control whose has three images and whose property is set to 2. 如果为该 按钮分配了只包含两个图像的新，则 该值将更改为1。If a new that has only two images is assigned to the button, the value changes to 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类， 并设置 和 属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets the and properties. 此代码要求已创建了一个 ，并为其分配了至少一个 。This code requires that an has been created and a minimum of one has been assigned to it. 此代码还要求在目录中有一个名为的位图图像 `MyBitMap.bmp` `C:\Graphics` 。This code also requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is less than -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置或属性时，将 设置属性 `null` ，即其默认值。When the or property is set, the property is set `null`, which is its default value. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性值更改为 `null` ，则 属性返回其默认值-1。If the property value is changed to `null`, the property returns its default value, -1. 但是，分配的 值在内部保留，并在另一个分配给属性时使用 。However, the assigned value is retained internally and used when another is assigned to the property. 如果分配给该属性的新属性的 属性值小于或等于属性赋给属性的值 减一 (因为该集合是从零开始的索引) ，则该 属性值将调整为小于 属性值的值。If the new assigned to the property has an property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the property minus one (because the collection is a zero-based index), the property value is adjusted to one less than the property value. 例如，请考虑一个按钮控件，其 包含三个图像，其 属性设置为2。For example, consider a button control whose has three images and whose property is set to 2. 如果为该 按钮分配了只包含两个图像的新，则 该值将更改为1。If a new that has only two images is assigned to the button, the value changes to 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类， 并设置 和 属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets the and properties. 此代码要求已创建了一个 ，并为其分配了至少一个 。This code requires that an has been created and a minimum of one has been assigned to it. 此代码还要求在目录中有一个名为的位图图像 `MyBitMap.bmp` `C:\Graphics` 。This code also requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，该按钮是的默认按钮 。When the property is set to `true`, the button is the default button for the . 这意味着，如果没有其他按钮或捕获 ENTER 键的任何其他控件具有焦点，则按 ENTER 键时，将单击该按钮。This means that the button is clicked when the ENTER key is pressed if no other button or any other control that captures the ENTER key has focus. 若要指定窗体的默认按钮，请将 窗体的属性设置为所需的按钮。To specify the default button of a form, set the property of the form to the desired button.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 如果按钮被禁用，请不要调用 (这包括在 派生类中重写时对基类的方法的调用 ) 。Do not call if the button is disabled (this includes calls to the base class's method when you override in a derived class). 在重写中的按钮时 ，请在 禁用该按钮之前调用基类的方法，否则根本不会调用它。When disabling the button in an override of , call the base class's method before disabling the button, or do not call it at all.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类， 并设置其一些公共属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 结果将是一个平面按钮，其左侧有文本，右侧有一个图像。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 此代码要求在目录中有一个名为的位图映像 `MyBitMap.bmp` `C:\Graphics` ，并且包含对该 命名空间的引用。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseCompatibleTextRendering : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是使用 类 (GDI +) 还是 类 (GDI) 来呈现文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class (GDI+) or the class (GDI) to render text.

value.span: 如果 类应用于执行文本呈现，以便与版本1.0 和1.1 兼容，则为。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性旨在提供 Windows 窗体控件之间的视觉兼容性，这些控件使用类呈现文本 ，.NET Framework 1.0 和使用类执行自定义文本呈现的 .NET Framework 1.1 应用程序之间的兼容性 。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and .NET Framework 1.0 and .NET Framework 1.1 applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大多数情况下，如果你的应用程序不是从 .NET Framework 1.0 或 .NET Framework 1.1 升级，则建议你将 `UseCompatibleTextRendering` 设置为的默认值 `false` 。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from .NET Framework 1.0 or .NET Framework 1.1, it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. .NET Framework 2.0 中引入了基于 GDI 的类，以提高性能，使文本更好地显示，并改善对国际字体的支持。The GDI based class was introduced in the .NET Framework 2.0 to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中，使用基于 GDI + 的 类来执行所有文本呈现。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the GDI+ based class was used to perform all text rendering. GDI 用不同于 GDI + 计算字符间距和自动换行。GDI calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from GDI+. 在使用类呈现文本的 Windows 窗体应用程序中 ，这可能会导致使用的控件的文本与 应用程序中的其他文本显示不相同。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解决这种不兼容性问题，可以将 `UseCompatibleTextRendering` 特定控件的属性设置为 `true` 。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要 `UseCompatibleTextRendering` `true` 为应用程序中的所有受支持的控件设置，请 使用参数调用方法 `true` 。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseMnemonic { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseMnemonic : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示前面有 & 符的第一个字符是否用作控件的助记键。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first character that is preceded by an ampersand (&) is used as the mnemonic key of the control.

value.span: 如果) (前面带有符号的第一个字符用作 & 控件的助记键，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if the first character that is preceded by an ampersand (&) is used as the mnemonic key of the control; otherwise, .
The default is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，确定是否使用视觉样式（如果支持）绘制背景。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines if the background is drawn using visual styles, if supported.

value.span: 如果要使用视觉样式绘制背景，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the background is drawn using visual styles; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视觉样式是控件外观的规格。Visual styles are specifications for the appearance of controls. 例如，视觉样式可以定义控件的颜色、大小和字体，并使你能够将视觉对象配置为与应用程序接口进行协调。For example, visual styles can define the color, size, and font of controls, and they enable you to configure the visual interface to coordinate with your application interface. 此外，它们还为所有基于 Windows 的应用程序提供了应用视觉样式的机制。Additionally, they provide a mechanism for all Windows-based applications to have visual styles applied.
